headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Viessmann heating systems with full control capabilities including boiler, DHW, and heating circuits. Features advanced rate limiting protection and automatic retry logic.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Your Viessmann API Client ID from the developer portal

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Your Viessmann API Client Secret (optional for public clients)

authMethod.title: Authentication Method
authMethod.description: Choose authentication method: 'auto' for automatic OAuth flow, 'manual' for manual token configuration

hostIp.title: Host IP Address
hostIp.description: IP address for OAuth redirect (auto-detected if not specified). Use the IP where Homebridge is running.

accessToken.title: Access Token (Manual Auth)
accessToken.description: Manual access token (only required if authMethod is 'manual')

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token (Manual Auth)
refreshToken.description: Manual refresh token (only required if authMethod is 'manual')

installationFilter.title: Installation Filter
installationFilter.description: Filter installations by name (case-insensitive substring match). Leave empty to show all installations.

installationIds.title: Installation IDs
installationIds.description: Array of specific installation IDs to include. Takes priority over installationFilter if specified.

refreshInterval.title: Refresh Interval (ms)
refreshInterval.description: How often to update device data (in milliseconds). Default: 60000 (1 minute). Increase to reduce API calls.

enableRateLimitProtection.title: Enable Rate Limit Protection
enableRateLimitProtection.description: Enable automatic rate limit protection with exponential backoff (recommended)

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed API calls

retryDelay.title: Retry Delay (ms)
retryDelay.description: Base delay between retry attempts in milliseconds (will be multiplied by backoff factor)

debug.title: Enable Debug Logging
debug.description: Enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting

layout.title: Account Settings
layout.description: Configure your Viessmann ViCare account credentials

layout.title: Authentication Method
layout.description: Choose how to authenticate with Viessmann API

layout.title: Manual Authentication (Advanced)
layout.description: Only required if authMethod is set to 'manual'

layout.title: Installation Filtering
layout.description: Filter which installations to show in HomeKit

layout.title: Rate Limiting & Performance
layout.description: Configure API rate limiting protection and performance settings
